mapper.sql: id, emp_id, emp_pwd, emp_name, emp_sex, emp_tel, emp_address, emp_type, create_time, update_time, is_lock, is_del
mapper.insert:
insert into emp_info
id,
emp_id,
emp_pwd,
emp_name,
emp_sex,
emp_tel,
emp_address,
emp_type,
create_time,
update_time,
is_lock,
is_del,

#{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{empPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{empSex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{empTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{empAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update emp_info
emp_id = #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_pwd = #{empPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_name = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_sex = #{empSex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
emp_tel = #{empTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_address = #{empAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_type = #{empType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE},
is_lock = #{isLock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update emp_info set emp_id = #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_pwd = #{empPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_name = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_sex = #{empSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, emp_tel = #{empTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_address = #{empAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_type = #{empType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, is_lock = #{isLock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from emp_info where emp_tel = #{emp_tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and emp_name = #{emp_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and id != #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 1

select
from emp_info where emp_tel = #{emp_tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1

select
from emp_info where emp_tel = #{emp_tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and id != #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 1

select
from emp_info order by id desc

select
from emp_info where emp_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{emp_name}), '%') order by id desc
